# Tam Thiên Thế Giới - AI Storytelling Game

This project is a Vietnamese AI-powered interactive storytelling game application.

## Project Type
Static web application with AI integration

## Technology Stack
- HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript (Vanilla)
- IndexedDB for local storage
- AI API integrations (OpenAI, Anthropic, Google AI)
- Responsive design

## Features
- Interactive storytelling with AI
- Save/Load game system
- AI Novel Writer
- Chat training interface
- Data training with vectorization
- Settings for API configuration
- Vietnamese language support
